scenario.name: Default
scenario.description: You are a newly arrived adventurer to the city of Torum. You are seeking to join the local adventurerâ€™s guild and take on jobs to earn a living.

storyCards.title: Torum
storyCards.content: The great city of torum is one of oldest cities in the Torumnal Empire. Great walls surround thriving guilds and stores. A great and diverse center of commerce and culture in the empire.
